description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
name of the participant
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant
role of the participant – focal_participant
name of the participant_2
age presented in years of the participant_2 – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant_2
role of the participant_2 – partner
species of individuals participating in the study – chimpanzee
name of the two participants that compose the dyad
species subgroup at time of data collection – WKPRC chimpanzee group a or b/ etc
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
whether a machine (yes) or a human (no) distributed the food
whether a partner chimpanzee was present (yes) in the adjacent room or not (no)
whether the focal participant exchanged the tool into either apparatus (yes)
whether the focal participant inserted the tool in the opt-out apparatus (yes)
whether the  focal participant did not take the tool – yes in case the participant did not take the tool
whether the focal participant actively refused to initiate the trial – yes in case -for example- of slamming the tool back in after it was offered initially
whether the  focal participant took the tool but left it somewhere else instead of exchange it
whether the focal participant actively refused to exchange the tool (for instance propelling tool out of cage)
whether the  focal participant completed the exchange but did not eat the food
whether the  focal participant actively rejected to eat the food (for instance propelling food out of cage)
whether the high value platform was located on the right or the left side
whether the main apparatus or the opt-out were reseted / rebaited first
whether the partner was present or not at the beginning of the test phase
the type of food presented to the focal participant - 1 / 2
whether the trial was excluded or not
